pages.title: Quarry Reborn
pages.text: Quarry Reborn is an extension of $(l:patchouli:blocks/tech_reborn)Tech Reborn$() that adds a Quarry machine which will mine ores in specific radius (7 by default), and consumes energy (6000 per block)$(br2)(No in-game book available)

pages.title: Quarry
pages.text: Using a lot of power this machine will mine out all the ores and/or blocks below it in a 7 block radius cube. Requires: Power, item output, and $(item)Quarry Tubes$(). You can also replace excavated blocks with stone variants

pages.title: Quarry Tubes
pages.text: Each layer that you want your quarry to mine down will require one (1) quarry tube. Tip: You might want to make a way to import these automatically so it doesn't stop on you.

pages.title: Upgrades
pages.text: The quarry can be upgraded using special craftable upgrades including:$(li)$(item)Range Extender Upgrades$(): 3 levels, up to 24 block radius$(li)$(item)Fortune Upgrades$(): 3 levels, up to fortune 3, not enchantable$(li)$(item)Silk Touch Upgrade$(): Does as advertised
